about_the_game:
🐙Storyline🐙
A squad of heavily armored vehicles creeps along the narrow path of the tentacle forest. They approach an open space surrounded by an insurmountable wall of grotesque tentacles. Countless creatures wave their limbs around excitedly. They're oozing mucus, eagerly awaiting the next "performance."

"Escorted by dozens of heavily armed soldiers, one little lady dressed in a flimsy outfit steps out from the car with tears glistening in her eyes. Once she's out of the car, the squad drives away, leaving nothing but dust behind it.

The little lady catches one last glimpse of her old friend as the convoy drives away. Her friend's gaze is full of pity and sadness... but... just before the convoy leaves and the tentacles block the path, her friend pulls out an m1911 semi-automatic and throws it to the little lady...

That's right! This is the arena that the tentacles built, made for battle (humiliation) between beautiful women and tentacle creepizoids."


The tentacle beings appeared suddenly on Earth, wreaking death and destruction in their wake. Desperate for peace, humanity agreed to make regular sacrificial offerings to the tentacles. One of those important sacrifices is a beautiful lady. She battles the tentacles in the arena and once she's defeated, they turn her into a spawning bed. This is all that stands between humanity and extinction.

Our little lady will also face a mysterious enemy in the arena. Use your amazing skills to defeat her, complete all the levels and escape!


🐙Game Details🐙
Survive in the arena against the tentacles and monsters. Gain new items every time you defeat a wave of enemies. Combine various items to find the build that suits you best and crush these depraved aliens in one fell swoop.

🐙Game Features🐙
-Challenging and varied rogue-like gameplay

-Pay attention to your position while shooting and get ready to launch sneak attacks on your enemies
- 16 static CG images without differences
- 15 in-game pixel animations

content_descriptors.notes:
All character depicted are over the age of 20.
Content Warning! This game contains: gang rape, pregnant sex, belly protrusion or inflation, interspecies sex, bondage, non-consensual sex, hypnosis and tentacles, exhibitionism, anal sex, footjobs, paizuri, blowjobs, sexual assault.

name: Endless Forest Dream

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: intel i5+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: support DirectX 12.0+
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: intel i5+
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: support DirectX 12.0+
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Survive in the arena against the tentacles and monsters. Gain new items every time you defeat a wave of enemies. Combine various items to find the build that suits you best and crush these depraved aliens in one fell swoop.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
